content: Largely sober fare in this week's roundup of the web's coolest content: major suicide hotspots, countries with too little concept of women's rights, rehab clinics (albeit in beautifully picturesque locations), and wrongfully accused death row inmates (who at least found freedom â€“ eventually). The gloom is only really lifted by a bunch of sinister fast food mascots. Actually, we take that back.
title: 5 Coolest Links of the Week
author: Karl Fabricius
